name: Kadath Express Travelogue
description:
Follow Lazlo Kodak as he boards the mysterious Kadath Express! 
Enjoy the sights until you eventually reach the end of the line…
Every journey will be different depending on your choices along the way.

If you like this free digital version, please consider buying a physical copy of the book:

https://kadathexpress.bigcartel.com/

Sales of this hard cover, limited edition, self-published book based on 5 years of my Inktober drawings will directly fund future adventures in the world of Kadath Express...(*coff* webcomic*coff*)

There's only about a 100 copies left, and then it's all gone...GONE!

And if I can ask you another favour...do feel free to share in the comments what you think, and share around if you liked it – the internet can be a silent place some times.

Story & Art by Ryan Lovelock 
https://www.instagram.com/rlovelock/
